{"id":1058479311,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â days, 6Â hours","timestamp":1695621336,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1058479311/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers II","memory":"71.5 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        if (!l1)\n            return l2;\n        if (!l2)\n            return l1;\n        l1 = reverseList(l1);\n        l2 = reverseList(l2);\n        \n        return reverseList(helper(l1, l2));\n    }\n\n    ListNode* reverseList(ListNode *head) {\n        ListNode *prev = NULL;\n\n        while (head) {\n            ListNode *nxt = head->next;\n            head->next = prev;\n            prev = head;\n            head = nxt;\n        }\n        return prev;\n    }\n\n    ListNode* helper(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode *dummy = new ListNode(0);\n        ListNode *tail = dummy;\n        int carry = 0;\n\n        while (l1 || l2 || carry != 0) {\n            int n1 = (l1 != NULL)? l1->val : 0;\n            int n2 = (l2 != NULL)? l2->val : 0;\n            int digit = (n1 + n2 + carry) % 10;\n            carry = (n1 + n2 + carry) / 10;\n\n            ListNode *node = new ListNode(digit);\n            tail->next = node;\n            tail = tail->next;\n\n            l1 = (l1 != NULL)? l1->next : NULL;\n            l2 = (l2 != NULL)? l2->next : NULL;\n        }\n        \n        ListNode *head = dummy->next;\n        delete dummy;\n        return head;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
